todos.content: Phase 1: Project setup (package.json, tsconfig.json, .env)
Phase 2: Database layer (SQLite connection, schema, repository)

Phase 4: Discord integration (client setup, voiceStateUpdate handler)
Phase 5: Slash commands (afk-config, afk-status)
Phase 6: Entry points (bot.ts, index.ts)
